revised_title: Shadowgraph Analysis of Flat Flames: Temperature and Intensity Distribution
tldr: The author investigates the structure of shadowgraphs in flat flames and correlates the shadowgraph intensity distribution with flame structure. They analyze the temperature and intensity distribution in the flame, providing a new point of reference for shadowgraphs when the distance between the flame and screen is significant. This research helps in understanding the behavior of flames and refining combustion processes.
